title: Engineering ultrafast exciton dynamics to boost organic photovoltaic performance
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03315A, Paper
Yu Guo, Guangchao Han, Jing Guo, Haotian Guo, Yuang Fu, Xiaodan Miao, Zhen Wang, Dongsheng Li, Shuixing Li, Xiaomin Xu, Xinhui Lu, Hongzheng Chen, Yuanping Yi, Philip C. Y. Chow
State-of-the-art organic photovoltaic (OPV) devices are based on Y6-acceptors, with power conversion efficiencies now exceeding 20%. However, the basic structure-photophysics-performance relationship of these materials remains unclear, hindering rational material development...
